Name: 新世勇者传
About the game: After a devastating war, the advanced creatures of cusol decided not to fight senseless battles. To warn posterity, the survivors of the war called it the 'two-world war'. The story takes place 100 years after the two-world war. Andy, the hero born in the new age, has to face the choice of fate... · characters with different characteristics · copy mode of repeatable strategy · hundreds of controllable reward characters · various casual games · excellent map scenes The words above are mechanical translations
